mapper.insert: insert into secret_key(app_id, app_key, app_secret) value (#{appId},#{appKey},#{appSecret});
mapper.select: select * from secret_key where app_id=#{appId} and flag=0
mapper.update: update secret_key set flag=1 where app_id=#{appId} and flag=0
mapper.select: select sk.app_id,a.app_name,sk.app_key,sk.app_secret,group_concat(r.role_name) as role from secret_key as sk left join app as a on sk.app_id=a.id and a.flag=0 left join app_role as ar on ar.app_id=sk.app_id and ar.flag=0 left join role as r on r.id=ar.role_id and r.flag=0 where sk.app_key=#{appKey} and sk.flag=0

select group_concat(r.role_name) as role from secret_key as sk left join app_role as ar on ar.app_id=sk.app_id and ar.flag=0 left join role as r on r.id=ar.role_id and r.flag=0 where sk.app_key=#{appKey} and sk.flag=0
